topic.title: Patient Level Information Costing System Data Set - Reconciliation
topic.shortdesc: IntroductionThe Patient Level Information Costing System Data Set - Reconciliation is used to help establish the Patient Level Information Costing quantum from the final audited accounts, and outline material differences between ACTIVITY data sets and Patient Level Information Costing totals and is an integral part of the Patient Level Information Costing submission process.
